alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:33PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Surging outflow from a cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Otero, northeastern Huerfano, northwestern Las Animas, southwestern Crowley and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 531 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking surging outflow from a cluster of strong thunderstorms along portions of northwestern Otero, northeastern Huerfano, northwestern Las Animas, southwestern Crowley and southeastern Pueblo Counties. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fowler, Manzanola, Olney Springs and Crowley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
